forecasts.raw_text: W winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 3 to 5 ft. Wave detail: S 4 ft at 7 seconds and NE 4 ft at 11 seconds. Patchy fog. A chance of rain late. Vsby 1 to 3 nm.

forecasts.raw_text: NE winds 5 to 10 kt, becoming E 10 to 15 kt after midnight. Seas 2 to 4 ft. Wave detail: E 4 ft at 6 seconds and E 4 ft at 11 seconds. A chance of rain in the evening, then showers with a slight chance of tstms after midnight.
